explains: adv. 技术上；专门地；学术上；工艺上

sentences.en: In those days recording sound was not technically possible.
sentences.cn: 在那个时候，录音在技术上是不可能的。

sentences.en: It is technically incorrect to talk about bat "radar", since they do not use radio waves.
sentences.cn: 蝙蝠“雷达”这个用语在技术上是错误的，因为它们不使用无线电波。

sentences.en: As a musician, she is technically accomplished.
sentences.cn: 作为乐师，她演奏艺术精湛。
